    • Method Detail

      • updateOppBestMove

        public void updateOppBestMove​(Board board,
                              int moveIndice)
        This method will find the best move of opponent if we choose this move's indice (for both single or double move).
        Parameters:
        board - - the current board
        moveIndice - - the tested move's indice
        Requires
        board != null;, isValidMove(moveIndice) == true;

      • calculateAllSingleMove

        public void calculateAllSingleMove()
        With the list of all possible single move. this method will calculate your possible gained balls and scores for that move it also classify the move get 4 ball (with 1-2 color) and the move get 2-3 ball (with only 1 color) because these are the most common situation

      • calculateAllDoubleMove

        public void calculateAllDoubleMove()
        With the list of all possible double move. this method will calculate your possible gained balls and scores for that move it also classify the move get 4 ball (with 1-2 color) and the move get 2-3 ball (with only 1 color) because these are the most common situation

      • sortPriority

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> sortPriority​(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> list)
        This method is choose the best move among those move that get 2,3,4 balls.
        Parameters:
        list - - the list of move get 2,3,4 balls
        Returns:
        the priority list of move

      • handle

        public int handle​(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> list)
        This method will divide the move get 2,3,4 ball into 2 sublist.
        Parameters:
        list - - list of moves that get 2,3,4 balls
        Returns:
        1st list if move you get more or equal balls || 2nd list if you get less balls
        Requires
        list != null

      • findBestMoreMove

        public int findBestMoreMove​(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> list)
        Find the best move among the list of move you have more ball than opponent.
        Parameters:
        list - - the list of move that player will gain more balls
        Returns:
        the best move among move that you have more ball
        Requires
        list != null;
